channel.title: Quest: Peeping
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Quest: Peeping"

item.title: Re: Quest: Peeping
item.content:encoded: rolling challenges work in a way that if you get 15 successes out of 400 you just need to get 385 more successes. so basically you need to do the quest 27 times with 15 successes to complete it. so just work on getting as many successes as possible to save stamina.

item.title: Quest: Peeping
item.content:encoded: It says to "drill a hole and peep! This is a Rolling Challenge!", which jutsu do I need to use for this qeust. Im sure its one of Lil' Bo's jutsu's but I don't know which one.
